ComicInfo.Summary:
KRAKOA, WE HAVE A PROBLEM!
The mutants are dying. Their island is dying. Earth itself is dying. All hope for humanity as a species lies in Protocol V. Protocol V isn't going to work.
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|---------------|---------------------------------|------------------| | Reg | Regular Cover | Valerio Schiti & Marte Gracia | 1 | | Var | Variant Cover | Matteo Scalera & Moreno DiNisio | 2 |
